name: Earl D. HALL Sr.; Betty Jane Hall; and Earl D. Hall, Jr., on behalf of Themselves and All Others Similarly Situated, Petitioners v. CNX GAS COMPANY, LLC, in Its Own Right and as Successor-in-Interest to Consol Gas Company, LLC, Respondent

parties: Earl D. HALL Sr.; Betty Jane Hall; and Earl D. Hall, Jr., on behalf of Themselves and All Others Similarly Situated, Petitioners v. CNX GAS COMPANY, LLC, in Its Own Right and as Successor-in-Interest to Consol Gas Company, LLC, Respondent

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 2nd day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
160 A.3d 787
Earl D. HALL Sr.; Betty Jane Hall; and Earl D. Hall, Jr., on behalf of Themselves and All Others Similarly Situated, Petitioners v. CNX GAS COMPANY, LLC, in Its Own Right and as Successor-in-Interest to Consol Gas Company, LLC, Respondent
No. 188 WAL 2016
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
November 2, 2016
